sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Set UI 16 Configuration Property css.$navpage-nav-color-sub to the value of css.$navpage-nav-unselected-color, since the proprety was split into two separate properties.</description>
        <name>Fix New UI 16 Configuration Properties</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function fixNewUI16ConfigProps() {
      if (pm.isZboot())
          return;

      var unselectedColor = gs.getProperty('css.$navpage-nav-unselected-color', '#d1d6d8'); // #bec1c6 was the previous value used in London and earlier
      var colorSub = gs.getProperty('css.$navpage-nav-color-sub', '#ffffff'); // #bec1c6 was also the previous value used in London but both diverged in M

      // OOB London, set to Madrid values
      if (unselectedColor == '#bec1c6')
          unselectedColor = '#d1d6d8';

      if (colorSub == '#bec1c6')
          colorSub = '#ffffff';

      gs.setProperty('css.$navpage-nav-color-sub', colorSub, 'Module text color for UI16');
      gs.setProperty('css.$navpage-nav-unselected-color', unselectedColor, 'Unselected navigation tab icon and favorite icons color');
}

fixNewUI16ConfigProps();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2017-03-17 22:25:37</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8742e265c7a13200bf14f149cb9763cd</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Fix New UI 16 Configuration Properties</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="UI16" source="com.glide.ui.ui16">58e374e43c31311068bcf327dfe37fa8</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_8742e265c7a13200bf14f149cb9763cd</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-04-25 22:25:37</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
